name: MC_PRICER_MSG_OUTPUT
description: This table contains core CMS message output data from the Epic Pricer.

columns.name: PRICER_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Epic Pricer message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MSG_OUT_NAME
columns.description: Node name for JSON representation of Epic Pricer output message.

columns.name: MSG_OUT_VAL
columns.description: Node value for JSON representation of Epic Pricer output message.

columns.name: MSG_OUT_PARENT
columns.description: Parent node for JSON representation of Epic Pricer output message.

columns.name: MSG_OUT_MC_NODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Node type for JSON representation of Epic Pricer output message.
